entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
